website_summaries.verdict: While it's a bit pricey at around $200, the Transit by Soen is one of the more sleekly designed and decent-sounding travel Bluetooth speakers.
pros: The Transit by Soen is a well-designed wireless Bluetooth speaker that delivers decent sound in a slim package that's travel-friendly
It's got a nifty retractable kickstand and built-in speakerphone capabilities
cons: Stiff competition at its somewhat elevated price point

customer_reviews.title: Small footprint with big sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound is clear and full. Easily paired with any of our tablets (android and windows), our Moto G 2 phone and iPhone 4. This is one of the best travel units I have tested. Small footprint with big sound. I don't know what the full battery life is, as I only had it playing for 5 hours, in which it performed flawlessly. I cannot imagine a time when I would use it for longer than 5 hours, so I have no idea as to the actual battery life. The only caveat I would level against them - for the price it should have had a protective travelling case included.
customer_reviews.author: azpect

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend for xmas and we both love it. We've tried other speakers but the sound quality isn't nearly as good. We travel a lot and it is so small and easy to throw in my purse for use at friend's places and in hotel rooms while on the road. It is very quick and easy to pair with my phone and the sound is clear. Volume can go quite high without distortion. With a sleek design and cover that protects it when not in use I would highly recommend this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Have not yet mastered it 100% but working on it.
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a Christmas present an do like the sound when playing through my computer via bluetooth but not so much when streaming from the iPhone 5s. Battery life seems pretty good so far.
customer_reviews.author: dfwsig

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny Quality Sound
customer_reviews.text: For what this speaker is, it is absolutely brilliant! If you need a speaker that is this size, there is nothing better.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Best Bluetooth speaker ever!!! Works right out of the box. Excellent workmanship. Great quality sound. Good bass. Not over powering, difficult to overdrive. Little to no distortion at highest sound levels.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size, great sound + cool protective cover included in the cost. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: George Light

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and sounding Bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.text: My father brought one home he got as a gift. It lay in a closet for almost two years. When I needed a Bluetooth speaker I remembered this good looking white speaker he ones brought home but everyone forgot. After a quick test, the battery was death but while charging, it connected to my OnePlus 5T instantly and both Pearl Jam as the Binaural Beats I tested on it surprised me. This little speaker was packing. For my presentation I used it outdoors in a group of six listening to a poem of Adam Roa and everyone was surprised of the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew 'Andy' Kirchner

customer_reviews.title: The Sound is Very Good and Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: This is a great add on to you iPad or iPhone. I have another cheaper similar device that I liked but wanted to see if there was something with better quality sound. This is indeed much better that the one I had. I used it recently to place Christmas music from my iPad throughout my office. It should fantastic! I got several compliments on its sound and questions as to where to get one and the cost. I wish I could have told them it was inexpensive but it's really not in my book, but I also believe that quality cost more. I do believe that even though it may not be inexpensive it is certainly worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Melton

customer_reviews.title: Modern, elegant, light weight, great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who walks in my office, the first thing they notice is the amazing sound and elegant and modern look of Transit. It has been quite interesting and a great enhancement to my office, since every business conversation that I have had in my office since December, when I purchased it, has revolved around it. Transit by Soen is Practical, wireless, modern design, light weight, and a great presentation as a gift. Everything since the moment that you get the box just tells you that this company that invented TRANSIT it's detailed oriented, The battery last four hours usually, sometimes longer, has a great clear sound, compatible with Samsung and Iphones, Tablets, etc. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Service

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Will go with me everywhere! The sound quality is incredible, it would be considered very good at twice the size. The compact design, fit and finish and ease of use are top of class. Even the packaging is top notch. On top of everything else, the speaker phone function is WAY more than an after thought. Sound quality on both ends is outstanding. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: navyvet123

customer_reviews.title: Solid design with crisp spund
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely slick design compare to any other Box looking speaker in the market. Perfectly solid with matte surfaces sophistication. Easy to carry in my laptop bag while traveling, with good battery life. I also find the speaker cover very useful while traveling to protect from any scratches. Since i use on my desk so bass and volume range is not important to me then the crisp sounds of classical tracks. Seriously consider if listening to classical, It really plays quite crisp.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: and i love it; the sound is great and loud for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for almost two years now, and i love it; the sound is great and loud for its size, the battery lasts forever even after having it for all this time, I use it everyday and everywhere. You are paying for quality with this, not a crappy celebrity endorsement. If you appreciate quality sound and from a quality company buy from Soen.

customer_reviews.title: Design and Quality - top notch
customer_reviews.text: I am super impressed by the high level of design, attention to details and quality of this speaker. Even the packaging is impressive! Easy bluetooth connection, great sound. And although it's small, it's mighty.

The size renders it a perfect travel companion with great sound on the go!!!
